projects.title: MVC Sample CRUD Demo
projects.name: mvc-sample-crud-demo
projects.description: A comprehensive demonstration of how to implement Model-View-Controller (MVC) CRUD operations in .NET 5x. This project showcases best practices for ASP.NET Core development, including data validation, entity relationships, and user interface design patterns.

projects.title: Data Analysis Demo
projects.name: data-analysis-demo
projects.description: An advanced demonstration application for data analysis of CSV files. Features include file upload, data parsing, statistical analysis, visualization capabilities, and export functionality. Built using modern web technologies for optimal performance.

projects.title: Project Mechanics
projects.name: project-mechanics
projects.description: A comprehensive website dedicated to project management methodology and resources. Provides detailed frameworks, best practices, templates, and tools for effective project execution and management across various industries.

projects.title: Project Portal
projects.name: project-portal
projects.description: Control Origins' comprehensive project management portal application. Features include project tracking, resource allocation, timeline management, collaboration tools, and detailed reporting capabilities for enterprise-level project management.

projects.title: Mark Hazleton Profile
projects.name: mark-hazleton-profile
projects.description: Professional profile website for Mark Hazleton, co-founder of Control Origins. Showcases his expertise in business technology solutions, regulatory compliance, strategic transformation consulting, and leadership in Microsoft Azure and cloud technologies.

projects.title: Async Demo
projects.name: async-demo
projects.description: Advanced demonstration of asynchronous API calls using Polly for timeout handling and resilience patterns. Showcases best practices for handling distributed system challenges, including retry policies, circuit breakers, and timeout management.

projects.title: TexEcon
projects.name: texecon
projects.description: Professional economic consulting platform website for Jared Hazleton. Provides economic analysis services, market research capabilities, and consulting expertise for businesses and organizations requiring economic insights and strategic planning.

projects.title: Control Origins Documents
projects.name: control-origins-documents
projects.description: Comprehensive document library system built using Markdown and PHP. Provides organized access to technical documentation, best practices guides, methodology frameworks, and knowledge base articles for business transformation and technology solutions.
